overview: Mark Palmer is responsible for the Jigsaw legal function. Before joining Jigsaw, Mark spent 12 years as a practicing attorney. His firm helped early stage companies develop and implement “best practice” policies and procedures in privacy, data protection, security, operations, dispute resolution and regulatory compliance. Mark graduated magna cum laude from the Katholieke Universiteit Leuven in Leuven Belgium, where he obtained his LL.M. in International Information & Communications Technology Law. Mark is also a graduate of the Duquesne University School of Law as well as Dickinson College.
